title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 point(s) maximum

Identify (1 point)

• The seed formation stage/immature seeds data point from the water only treatment

Reasoning (1 point)

• The data span several orders of magnitude

• Enables display of all data on one graph

• Couldn’t visually distinguish differences in smaller values if they were plotted on a linear scale
